testcase.name: Alerts Pass
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to tools home page......................................passed And The user navigate to "Alerts, Frame & Windows"..........................passed And The user click to "Alerts"..............................................passed When The user sees warning button and passes................................passed And The user waits five seconds and passes..................................passed And The user sees verifies "Do you confirm action?" and passes..............passed Then The user enter "Hello" and verify "You entered Hello"..................passed

testcase.name: Drog And Drop
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to tools home page......................................passed And The user navigate to "Interactions".....................................passed And The user click to "Droppable"...........................................passed When The user keeps dragging and dropping...................................passed Then The user verify the "Dropped!".........................................passed

testcase.name: Tool Tips
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to tools home page......................................passed And The user navigate to "Widgets"..........................................passed And The user click to "Tool Tips"...........................................passed And user hovers over the Hover me to see button and verify message "You hovered over the Button".passed Then user hovers over the Hover me to see text field and verify message "You hovered over the text field".passed
